git  clone --depth 1 --origin "poco-serial-1.11.0-release" "https://github.com/vtpl1/poco.git"
mkdir install_debug
mkdir cmake-build-poco
cd cmake-build-poco
cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=NO -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../install" "../poco" -G"Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64
cmake --build . --config Release --target install --parallel 12
cmake -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=NO -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../install_debug"  "../poco" -G"Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64
cmake --build . --config Debug --target install --parallel 12
cd ..
git clone --depth 1 --origin "4.5.4" https://github.com/opencv/opencv_contrib
git clone --depth 1 --origin "4.5.4" https://github.com/opencv/opencv
mkdir cmake-build-opencv
cd cmake-build-opencv
cmake -DENABLE_CXX11=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_core:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_imgproc:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_highgui:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_video:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_flann:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_ml:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_features2d:BOOL=ON^
        -DWITH_FFMPEG:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_calib3d:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_objdetect:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_contrib:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_JPEG:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_ZLIB:BOOL=ON^
        -DOPENCV_ENABLE_NONFREE=ON^
        -DENABLE_FAST_MATH:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL=OFF^
        -DWITH_CUDA:BOOL=OFF^
        -DWITH_NVCUVID:BOOL=OFF^
        -DWITH_EIGEN:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_DOCS:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_EXAMPLES:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_python2=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_python3=OFF^
        -DWITH_PYTHON=OFF^
        -DBUILD_NEW_PYTHON_SUPPORT:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_WITH_DEBUG_INFO:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_PACKAGE:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_apps:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_gpu:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_legacy:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_java:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_photo:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_nonfree:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_ocl:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_stitching:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_superres:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_ts:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_videostab:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_TESTS:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_PERF_TESTS:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_WITH_CAROTENE:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_world:BOOL=OFF^
        -DWITH_IPP:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_WITH_STATIC_CRT:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_FAT_JAVA_LIB:BOOL=OFF^
        -DOPENCV_EXTRA_MODULES_PATH="../opencv_contrib/modules"^
        -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../install"^
        "../opencv" -G"Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64
cmake --build . --config Release --target install --parallel 12

cmake -DENABLE_CXX11=ON^
        -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug^
        -DBUILD_opencv_core:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_imgproc:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_highgui:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_video:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_flann:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_ml:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_features2d:BOOL=ON^
        -DWITH_FFMPEG:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_calib3d:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_objdetect:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_opencv_contrib:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_JPEG:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_ZLIB:BOOL=ON^
        -DOPENCV_ENABLE_NONFREE=ON^
        -DENABLE_FAST_MATH:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL=OFF^
        -DWITH_CUDA:BOOL=OFF^
        -DWITH_NVCUVID:BOOL=OFF^
        -DWITH_EIGEN:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_DOCS:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_EXAMPLES:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_python2=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_python3=OFF^
        -DWITH_PYTHON=OFF^
        -DBUILD_NEW_PYTHON_SUPPORT:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_WITH_DEBUG_INFO:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_PACKAGE:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_apps:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_gpu:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_legacy:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_java:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_photo:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_nonfree:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_ocl:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_stitching:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_superres:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_ts:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_videostab:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_TESTS:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_PERF_TESTS:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_WITH_CAROTENE:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_opencv_world:BOOL=OFF^
        -DWITH_IPP:BOOL=ON^
        -DBUILD_WITH_STATIC_CRT:BOOL=OFF^
        -DBUILD_FAT_JAVA_LIB:BOOL=OFF^
        -DOPENCV_EXTRA_MODULES_PATH="../opencv_contrib/modules"^
        -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../install_debug"^
        "../opencv" -G"Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64
cmake --build . --config Debug --target install --parallel 12
cd ..
git clone --depth 1 --origin "1.9.1" --recursive https://github.com/Microsoft/onnxruntime
cd onnxruntime
build.bat --config Release --target install --skip_tests --build_shared_lib --parallel 12 --cmake_extra_defines CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../../../../install"
build.bat --config Debug --target install --skip_tests --build_shared_lib --parallel 12  --cmake_extra_defines CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../../../../install_debug"
cd ..
git clone --depth 1 --origin "19.22" --recursive https://github.com/davisking/dlib.git
mkdir cmake-build-dlib
cd cmake-build-dlib
cmake -DDLIB_USE_CUDA=OFF -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../install" "../dlib" -G"Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64
cmake --build . --config Release --target install --parallel 12

cd ..
git  clone --depth 1 --origin "v1.9.2" "https://github.com/gabime/spdlog.git"
mkdir cmake-build-spdlog
cd cmake-build-spdlog
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../install" "../spdlog" -G"Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64
cmake --build . --config Release --target install
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../install_debug" "../spdlog" -G"Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64
cmake --build . --config Debug --target install

cd ..
git  clone --depth 1 --origin "lts_2021_03_24" "https://github.com/abseil/abseil-cpp.git"
mkdir cmake-build-abseil
cd cmake-build-abseil

cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../install" -DABSL_ENABLE_INSTALL=ON "../abseil-cpp" -G"Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64
cmake --build . --config Release --target install
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="./../install_debug" -DABSL_ENABLE_INSTALL=ON "../abseil-cpp" -G"Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64
cmake --build . --config Debug --target install


cmake ..  -G"Visual Studio 16 2019" -A x64 -DONNXRUNTIME_ROOTDIR=D:\WorkFiles\RnD\video_parser\thirdparty\install
